item.name: تسجيل الدخول الاجتماعي

request.description:
تسجيل الدخول باستخدام مزود اجتماعي (مثل Google أو Facebook)

**الباراميترات:**
- `id_token`: توكن مزود الخدمة (مطلوب)
- `name`: اسم المستخدم (اختياري)
- `phone`: رقم هاتف المستخدم (اختياري)
- `avatar`: رابط الصورة الشخصية (اختياري)

**ملاحظات:**
- يجب تعيين قيمة `{{provider}}` إلى أحد القيم المدعومة: `google`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `apple`
- يستخدم التطبيق Firebase للتحقق من التوكن، لذا يجب استخدام `id_token` بدلاً من `access_token`

إعادة توجيه المستخدم إلى صفحة تسجيل الدخول الخاصة بمزود الخدمة.

**الباراميترات:**
- لا يوجد باراميترات في الطلب

**ملاحظات:**
- يجب تعيين قيمة `{{provider}}` إلى أحد القيم المدعومة: `google`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `apple`
- يستخدم عادة في تطبيقات الويب وليس تطبيقات الموبايل

استقبال رد مزود الخدمة بعد نجاح تسجيل الدخول (عادة في تطبيقات الويب).

**الباراميترات:**
- لا يوجد باراميترات في الطلب نفسه، لكن المزود سيرسل باراميترات عبر الرابط

**ملاحظات:**
- يجب تعيين قيمة `{{provider}}` إلى أحد القيم المدعومة: `google`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `apple`
- هذا الرابط هو ما يتم تكوينه في إعدادات المزود (OAuth redirect URI)

ربط حساب اجتماعي بحساب المستخدم الحالي (يتطلب تسجيل دخول).

**الباراميترات:**
- `id_token`: توكن مزود الخدمة (مطلوب)

**التوثيق:**
- يتطلب توكن المستخدم (`Bearer token`)

**ملاحظات:**
- يجب تعيين قيمة `{{provider}}` إلى أحد القيم المدعومة: `google`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `apple`
- يستخدم التطبيق Firebase للتحقق من التوكن، لذا يجب استخدام `id_token` بدلاً من `access_token`

إلغاء ربط حساب اجتماعي من حساب المستخدم الحالي (يتطلب تسجيل دخول).

**الباراميترات:**
- لا يوجد باراميترات في الطلب

**التوثيق:**
- يتطلب توكن المستخدم (`Bearer token`)

**ملاحظات:**
- يجب تعيين قيمة `{{provider}}` إلى أحد القيم المدعومة: `google`, `facebook`, `twitter`, `apple`

item.name: Notifications

request.description:
Get user notifications with pagination.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Query Parameters:**
- `per_page` (integer, optional): Number of notifications per page (default: 15)
- `page` (integer, optional): Page number (default: 1)

response.name: Get Notifications
Get Notifications

request.description:
Get count of unread notifications for the current user.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- `count` (integer): Number of unread notifications

response.name: Get Unread Count

request.description:
Mark a specific notification as read.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Notification ID to mark as read

request.description:
Mark all notifications as read for the current user.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

response.name: Mark All Notifications as Read

request.description:
Delete a specific notification.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Notification ID to delete

request.description:
Get application information and general settings.

**Response:**
- `site_name` (string): Application name
- `site_email` (string): Support email
- `site_phone` (string): Support phone number
- `default_language` (string): Default language code
- `allow_registration` (boolean): Whether registration is allowed

response.name: Get App Info

request.description:
Get a specific setting by key.

**Path Parameters:**
- `key` (string, required): Setting key to retrieve

**Response:**
- `key` (string): Setting key
- `value` (mixed): Setting value

response.name: Get Setting by Key

item.name: Packages

request.description:
Get a paginated list of available packages with filtering options.

**Query Parameters:**
- `min_price` (number, optional): Minimum price filter
- `max_price` (number, optional): Maximum price filter
- `min_duration` (integer, optional): Minimum duration in days
- `max_duration` (integer, optional): Maximum duration in days
- `start_location` (string, optional): Filter by start location
- `end_location` (string, optional): Filter by end location
- `start_date` (date, optional): Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `end_date` (date, optional): Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `office_id` (integer, optional): Filter by office ID
- `search` (string, optional): Search packages by name or description
- `sort` (string, optional): Sort order (popularity, price_asc, price_desc, duration_asc, duration_desc, date_asc, date_desc)
- `per_page` (integer, optional): Items per page (default: 12)

request.description:
Get a paginated list of Umrah offices with filtering options.

**Query Parameters:**
- `rating` (integer, optional): Filter by minimum rating (1-5)
- `search` (string, optional): Search offices by name or description
- `sort` (string, optional): Sort order (rating_asc, rating_desc, popularity_desc, name_asc)
- `per_page` (integer, optional): Items per page (default: 12)

item.name: Bookings

request.description:
Create a new booking for a package.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `package_id` (integer, required): ID of the package to book
- `travelers` (array, required): Array of traveler information
  - `name` (string, required): Traveler's full name
  - `passport_number` (string, required): Passport number
  - `nationality` (string, required): Country of citizenship
  - `date_of_birth` (date, required): Date of birth (YYYY-MM-DD)
  - `passport_expiry` (date, required): Passport expiry date (YYYY-MM-DD)
  - `phone` (string, required): Contact phone number
- `start_date` (date, required): Booking start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `payment_method` (string, required): Payment method (credit_card, bank_transfer, etc.)
- `special_requests` (string, optional): Any special requirements or notes

request.description:
Download the invoice as a PDF file.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`
- `Accept: application/pdf`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Booking ID

**Response:**
- PDF file download

item.description: Booking management endpoints.

item.name: Payments

request.description:
Get available payment methods.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Array of available payment methods with their details

Process a payment for a booking.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `booking_id` (integer, required): ID of the booking to process payment for
- `payment_method` (string, required): Payment method (credit_card, bank_transfer, etc.)
- `amount` (number, required): Payment amount
- `currency` (string, required): Currency code (SAR, USD, etc.)
- `card` (object, required for credit_card): Card details
  - `number` (string, required): Card number
  - `exp_month` (integer, required): Expiration month (1-12)
  - `exp_year` (integer, required): Expiration year
  - `cvc` (string, required): Card security code
  - `name` (string, required): Cardholder name

Get the status of a payment.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Payment ID

**Response:**
- Payment details including status, amount, payment method, timestamp, etc.

Request a refund for a payment.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `payment_id` (integer, required): ID of the payment to refund
- `reason` (string, required): Reason for requesting refund
- `amount` (number, optional): Amount to refund (if partial refund)

Get a receipt for a payment.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`
- `Accept: application/pdf`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Payment ID

**Response:**
- PDF receipt file

item.description: Payment processing endpoints.

item.name: File Management

request.description:
Upload a file to the system.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body (form-data):**
- `file` (file, required): The file to upload
- `type` (string, required): Type of file (profile, document, gallery, etc.)
- `entity_id` (integer, optional): ID of the related entity (user, package, hotel, etc.)

Delete a previously uploaded file.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `file_id` (integer, required): ID of the file to delete

item.description: File upload and management endpoints.

request.description:

**Required Headers:**

- `status` (string, optional): Filter by booking status (pending, confirmed, cancelled, completed)
- `from_date` (date, optional): Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `to_date` (date, optional): Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `per_page` (integer, optional): Items per page (default: 15)

request.description:
Get booking statistics for the office.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Booking statistics including total bookings, revenue, popular packages, etc.

request.description:
Update the bus operator profile information.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Request Body:**
- `name` (string, optional): Updated operator name
- `phone` (string, optional): Updated phone number
- `address` (string, optional): Updated address
- `description` (string, optional): Updated description

Get statistics for the bus operator.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Operator statistics including total buses, bookings, revenue, etc.

Get all buses managed by the operator.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Response:**
- Array of buses with their details

Update the current location of a bus.

**Required Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{token}}`

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (integer, required): Bus ID

**Request Body:**
- `latitude` (number, required): Latitude coordinate
- `longitude` (number, required): Longitude coordinate
